description: Abana bose bashobora kurindwa ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina haba mu ngo, mu miryango, ku ishuri, n’ahandi.
title: Abana bose bashobora kurindwa ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina haba mu ngo, mu miryango, ku ishuri, n’ahandi.
content: Abana bose bashobora kurindwa ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina haba mu ngo, mu miryango, ku ishuri, n’ahandi. Iyo bigaragaye ko umwana yakorewe iri hohoterwa, akenera ubufasha bwihuse mu rwego rwo kubungabunga ubuzima bwe ndetse no ubahiriza uburenganzira bwe.
